definitions.definition: to put something such as a tool, skill, or building to a particular purpose:
examples: This glass has been used - could you get me a clean one?

definitions.definition: a purpose for which something is used:
examples: A food processor has a variety of uses in the kitchen.

definitions.definition: the act of using something, or a period of time when something is being used or can be used:
examples: You should be able to put your experience in electronics to (good) use in your new job.

definitions.definition: to use something that is available:
examples: We might as well make use of the hotel's facilities.

definitions.definition: permission to use something, or the ability to use something:
examples: They said we could have the use of their beach house whenever they weren't there.
